name: Jake's Love Story
description: Everyday life comedy, where your choices matter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 340 MB available space
